reasoning: Duchenne muscular dystrophy (DMD) incidence ~1 in 3,500-5,000 male births (~2.5 per 100k live births). X-linked recessive disorder with robust epidemiological data from multiple registries.
source: Mah JK et al. (2014). A systematic review and meta-analysis on the epidemiology of Duchenne and Becker muscular dystrophy. Neuromuscul Disord. 24(6):482-491
